Description: A plugin to provide playback controls and data from your Stream Deck
Name: CiderDeck

sh.cider.streamdeck.songname.Name: Song Name
sh.cider.streamdeck.songname.Tooltip: Provides a tile to show the currently playing song from Cider.

sh.cider.streamdeck.albumart.Name: Album Art
sh.cider.streamdeck.albumart.Tooltip: Provides a tile to show the currently playing song's Album Art from Cider.

sh.cider.streamdeck.toggle.Name: Toggle Playback
sh.cider.streamdeck.toggle.Tooltip: Provides a tile to toggle the currently playing song in Cider.

sh.cider.streamdeck.skip.Name: Skip
sh.cider.streamdeck.skip.Tooltip: Provides a tile to skip the currently playing song in Cider.

sh.cider.streamdeck.previous.Name: Previous
sh.cider.streamdeck.previous.Tooltip: Provides a tile to play the previous song in Cider.
